page.title: 10VILLAGE SURVEY 1985
page.content:
From the section on village inhabitants, the replies represent the views of a total of{312}people,{219}of whom are{19}or older. The future of{SOUTH KILWORTH}looks secure with{85}families intendig to stay in{SOUTH KILWORTH. 8}moving elsewhere.
{10}reasons where given for coming to{ {SOUTH KILWORTH { 28}because of business or employment { 22}for the village enviroment { 12}for accomodation i.e. house for sale or rent { 5}because of family ties {2}were born here { 2}came for retirement { 1}for marriage { 1}for the motorway network { 1}came by chance.
